name: vrchat avatar submission
description:
my submission for the vrchat Spookality.

I'll throw this info out here if it helps filter my avatar

I used VRoid Studio to make this avatar

I followed a youtubers guide PHIA on how to make the avatar then later how to attach a hat to her head.

and this was the asset hat i used
https://booth.pm/en/items/3320890


It's nothing fancy im not even sure if it'll be looked at or accepted, but i had fun making it and learning how to make a hat stay on a head.

it's a halloween themed avatar based on myself with a wizard of oz wicked witch theme
